name: Magna Caves
description:
Magna Caves is a block-pushing puzzle game that introduces magnetism on top of the usual block-pushing mechanics inspired by Sokoban, Kwirk and Pokemon's boulder-pushing puzzles. In a tile-based cave of odd-shaped magnetizable rocks & magnetic sources, you’ll need to plan steps ahead and figure out the optimal path to the treasure - in order to get your 3 stars!

Featuring:

  • Surprising & exciting block-pushing mechanics arising from magnetism
  • Tiled-based levels based on “least moves” and a 3-star mastery system
  • “Undo” & “reset” the level with keyboard shortcuts
  • Move & zoom the camera in/out to plan out your moves

Coming soon: build & share your very own Magna Caves puzzles with a custom level editor! Be sure to follow this space as we'll be posting updates on this.

Supporting Us

If you are enjoying Magna Caves, add this game to your collection, put in a few dollars, and share it with your friends! We appreciate any kind of contribution to keep the game going :)

We're trying to make our game even more fun! Discuss the game in our community forums, or share any feedback, bugs or questions about Magna Caves here.
